agentUtterance.text: Sure! Which product would you like to receive information about?

userUtterance.text: I want to know about Poco X4

agentUtterance.text: Sure! The Poco X4 is a great choice. It has a 6.67-inch AMOLED display, a Snapdragon 695 processor, and a 5000mAh battery. It also has a 64MP quad-camera setup and a 20MP front-facing camera. It comes with 8GB RAM, 256GB Storage.
Yes, the Poco X4 supports 5G connectivity.
The Poco X4 is available in three colors: Arctic Blue, Cosmic Black, and Laser Blue.

userUtterance.text: What is the price of it?

userUtterance.text: Could you suggest which spec would be the most budget friendly option?

agentUtterance.text: The Poco X3 is a more budget-friendly option. It has a 6.67-inch IPS LCD display, a Snapdragon 732G processor, and a 5160mAh battery. It also has a 64MP quad-camera setup and a 20MP front-facing camera. It comes with 6GB RAM, 128GB Storage. It is priced at $199.
